segments.text: Is this the first time you've come to our city , Mr . Ross ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Correct . I have expected to visit here for a long time . So fortunate for me , I can realize this expectation and meet you , Arden , and your kind-hearted staff in your company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am so honored to hear that . Well , after staying here for several days , you must have some ideas about our company . We have been in the clothes field for many years , and yours brand is also well-known in the country . How about our cooperation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is one of reasons why I am here now . I am really willing to have some cooperation with your company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We intend to establish business relationship with your company on the basis of equality and mutual benefit .
segments.speaker: S1
